text.div:
VhDir Digital Certificate Standard Value Set

This value set includes a list of standards defining digital certificates.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/vhdir/CodeSystem/digitalcertificate
    CodeDisplay
    x.509v3x.509v3A standard published by the International Telecommunication Unionâ€™s Telecommunication Standardization Sector (ITU-T) that defines a framework for public-key certificates, including specification of data objects used to represent the certificates themselves.

name: VhDirDigitalCertificateStandard
title: VhDir Digital Certificate Standard Value Set
description: This value set includes a list of standards defining digital certificates.
